de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller

Class BaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.BaseController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugSceneController, GameController, GameHistoryController, HomescreenController, LoginController, NewGameController

    public abstract class BaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Benjamin Wulfert The BaseController is the abstract base class for every ui controller within the front-end application.
